songs.comments: Lecture given by Mark C. Peterson November 2009. What's prophesied in Isaiah, the BofM, and the Book of Revelation regarding America. Topics: Government, Secret Combinations, Destiny of America, US Constitution, the Church, the Cleansing of America, Follo
